# Hi, I'm Arvind Venkatadri.

I'm an Adjunct Professor at the [School of Management and Commerce Studies, DSU](https://www.dsu.edu.in/academics/schools/management-studies), and a part-time Faculty at the [Srishti Manipal Institute of Art and Design](https://srishtimanipalinstitute.in), both in Bangalore, INDIA. I have a passion for coding in R,
Data Visualization, Complexity Science, Literature, and Creative
Thinking and Problem Solving with TRIZ. On this blog, I share and teach
what I learn.

To get started, you can check out my courses. You can also find me on
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/arvind_v), 
[GitHub](https://github.com/arvindvenkatadri), and on [Medium](https://medium.com/@arvind.venkatadri). Feel free to
reach out to me via [email](mailto:arvind.venkatadri@gmail.com) !
